column4: going to ask a silly question, used to you could kill the xserver via ctrl - alt - backspace, nowadays it just reruns it when you attempt to do that, is there a stopx command or anything along the lines to gracefully close X?
ctrl-alt-backspace kills it, then gdm starts it agiain, so stop gdm like so:  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm stop
I would log out first btw
